topics.body:
So I just got  back from my mom's place. If you didn't know my mom has 2 toy poodles. One male  and one female. The female is currently in heat. While I was talking with my mom about some stuff we hear one of the dogs start squealing like a fire alarm.
[spoiler]We found the dogs _connected_. And it freaked the female out something fierce so she just starts running around with the male dog still attached to her. We had to chase them through the living room and I had to lift the couch because they ran under it. I then had to hold them for the next thirty minutes while they _disconnected._[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
